django.contrib.gis.sitemaps.kml
===============================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.sitemaps.kml


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.sitemaps.kml.KMLSitemap
   django.contrib.gis.sitemaps.kml.KMZSitemap


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: KMLSitemap(locations=None)

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.contrib.sitemaps.Sitemap`


   A minimal hook to produce KML sitemaps.


   .. py:attribute:: geo_format
      :value: 'kml'



   .. py:attribute:: locations
      :value: []



   .. py:method:: get_urls(page=1, site=None, protocol=None)

      This method is overridden so the appropriate `geo_format` attribute
      is placed on each URL element.



   .. py:method:: items()


   .. py:method:: location(obj)


.. py:class:: KMZSitemap(locations=None)

   Bases: :py:obj:`KMLSitemap`


   A minimal hook to produce KML sitemaps.


   .. py:attribute:: geo_format
      :value: 'kmz'
